weekly_top_story.headline: Israeli Airstrike Kills Yemen Houthi Rebel Prime Minister
weekly_top_story.summary: An Israeli airstrike on August 29, 2025, killed the prime minister of Yemen’s Iran-backed Houthi rebel government, intensifying regional tensions and complicating peace efforts in the Middle East.

stories.headline: Russian President Putin Arrives in China for 2025 SCO Summit
stories.summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin attended the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Summit in Tianjin, China, marking a key moment in regional alliances and global diplomacy.

stories.headline: US Embassy in Jakarta Issues Demonstration Alert for August 31
stories.summary: The US Embassy in Jakarta warned of planned demonstrations on August 31, 2025, highlighting ongoing civil unrest concerns in Indonesia affecting diplomatic operations.
